backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to populate the PositionSizeCalculator asset selector with all Binance USD-M Futures perpetual pairs via the useBinancePairs hook, including loading/error states.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key details of each component, hook, utility, and service in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with PWA manifest, theme color, favicon, Apple touch icon, and mobile web app meta tags configured.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for Crypto Position Monitor defining app name, icons, display mode, theme color, categories, and an 'Add Position' shortcut.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets, network-first for HTML and Binance API calls, with separate static and dynamic caches and old cache cleanup on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab navigation, position storage, monitoring, and portfolio exposure, rendering Dashboard, AI Daily Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management tabs, and a settings dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdjustmentSugges: Alert-style card that presents an AI-generated stop-loss or take-profit adjustment suggestion with current vs. proposed levels, confidence badge, and accept/dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSec: Collapsible section component that displays AI-generated daily trade cards with loading skeletons, live price monitoring, last-updated timestamp, and a force-refresh button.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSum: Displays a summary panel for today's AI trading portfolio, showing total PnL (USD and percent), winning/losing trade counts, and the number of reversal guard activations pulled from trade history storage.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesTab: Tab layout component that composes the AIDailyTradesSection and PerformanceComparisonPanel into a single vertically stacked view.
frontend/src/components/AIInsightsTab.ts: Renders AI-driven insights for each open position, including sentiment gauges, trend predictions, and dismissible adjustment suggestions for stop-loss and take-profit levels.
frontend/src/components/AITradeCard.tsx: Card component for displaying a single AI trade's details including modality, PnL, take-profit progress bars, risk management step tracker, reversal guard status, and a live-trading toggle.
frontend/src/components/BinanceCredentia: Form panel for saving, clearing, and testing Binance API credentials, with connection status feedback (connected, invalid, timeout, error) and masked secret display.
frontend/src/components/CredentialStatus: Memoized badge indicator that reactively shows whether Binance API credentials are stored and whether live trading mode is active, listening to custom DOM events for updates.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx: Renders the main dashboard tab with a capital summary, open positions list, and a button to import live positions from Binance when credentials are available.
frontend/src/components/ExposureChart.ts: Displays two cards showing asset allocation percentages and long/short balance as progress bars based on provided exposure and capital data.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Renders a PWA install button that triggers the native install prompt if available, or shows a manual instructions modal otherwise; hidden when already installed.
frontend/src/components/InstallInstructi: Shows a dialog with step-by-step PWA installation instructions for multiple browsers (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox) on both mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/LiveRiskMetricsC: Fetches live prices and leverage bracket data from Binance to compute and display per-position liquidation prices, distances, and risk levels (safe/warning/danger).
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingBanne: Displays an amber warning banner when live trading mode is active, reactively updating via custom DOM events without page reload.
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingToggl: Provides a switch to enable/disable live trading mode, showing a confirmation dialog before activation and a timeout safety mechanism that auto-disables after 20 seconds.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceCompa: Renders a side-by-side performance comparison panel between AI trades and user trades, displaying metrics like win rate, PnL, and trade counts sourced from local storage utilities.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioExposur: Displays a portfolio exposure dashboard card showing total capital deployed, capital at risk, live unrealized PnL, and live exposure, with support for enriched live-price positions.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Renders an individual trading position card with PnL display, TP/SL proximity alerts, AI insights collapsible section, adjustment suggestions, and a trade outcome modal triggered on deletion.
frontend/src/components/PositionDashboar: Renders the active positions dashboard by fetching live price data via a monitoring hook and mapping each position to a PositionCard, with loading, error, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/PositionEntryFor: Provides a form for manually entering a new trading position, fetching historical klines to auto-calculate take-profit levels and stop-loss, then submitting the constructed position object.
frontend/src/components/PositionSizeCalc: A React component that calculates optimal position sizes for crypto futures trades using inputs like capital, risk percentage, entry/stop-loss prices, and leverage, with live Binance price and leverage bracket data fetched via React Query.
frontend/src/components/RiskManagementTa: A tab layout component that composes the LiveRiskMetricsCard, PositionSizeCalculator, PortfolioExposureDashboard, and ScenarioSimulator into a single Risk Management view, conditionally rendering exposure and metrics only when positions exist.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioSimulato: A component that simulates portfolio P&L impact under user-defined or preset percentage price changes, enriching positions with live Binance prices and computing ATR-based scenario presets from historical kline data.
frontend/src/components/SentimentGauge.t: Displays a market sentiment card for a given symbol showing bullish/bearish/neutral score, strength percentage, and contributing indicator factors sourced from the useSentimentAnalysis hook.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: A modal dialog with three tabs for configuring Binance API credentials, enabling live trading mode, and setting total capital, using sub-components for each settings section.
frontend/src/components/StopLossRecommen: Renders a stop-loss recommendation card showing the stop price, distance from current price, max loss in USD/percent, capital risk percentage, reasoning, and a partial-taking strategy alert.
frontend/src/components/TabNavigation.ts: A sticky top navigation bar component that renders four app tabs (Dashboard, AI Daily Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management) with active-state highlighting and responsive label truncation.
frontend/src/components/TakeProfitRecomm: Renders a list of take-profit level cards for a position, showing target price, distance from current price, expected profit, and whether each level has been reached.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalInpu: A form card that lets the user enter and save their total trading capital to local storage, with validation and a success indicator.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalSumm: Displays a capital summary card showing total, deployed, available, and at-risk capital across all positions, with inline editing support and reactivity to capital changes via a custom DOM event.
frontend/src/components/TradeOutcomeModa: A dialog modal for closing a position by selecting a trade outcome (TP hit, SL hit, or manual close), entering an exit price, and saving a trade record with calculated PnL.
frontend/src/components/TrendPredictionC: Displays AI-generated short-term and medium-term trend predictions (direction and confidence) for a given symbol using the useTrendPrediction hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdjustmentSuggesti: Fetches hourly Binance kline data for each position and returns AI-generated adjustment suggestions, refreshing every 30 seconds.
A React Query hook that generates AI trades for each trading modality, optionally placing live Binance market, take-profit, and stop-loss orders with per-call timeouts and toast notifications.
Polls current prices for AI trades and updates trade state (TP/SL execution, reversal detection, risk management steps) via React Query, persisting changes to localStorage and optionally placing live Binance orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useAITradeStorage.ts: Provides CRUD helpers for persisting AI daily trades in localStorage, applying default values for execution-state fields and skipping date-based invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: Fetches and caches the list of Binance perpetual futures pairs, refreshing every hour with up to 3 retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout, status tracking, and persistent identity loading via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveTradingMode.ts: Manages live trading toggle state, validating Binance API credentials with a timeout before enabling and syncing state via custom window events.
Enriches portfolio positions with live Binance prices, computing live exposure, unrealized PnL, liquidation price, and distance to liquidation, refreshed every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionMonitoring: React Query hook that polls Binance every 5 seconds to fetch current prices for all tracked positions and computes PnL, distance to TP1, and distance to stop-loss for each.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionStorage.ts: Hook managing position persistence in localStorage with optional live order placement (market, TP, SL) via Binance Futures API when live trading is enabled, using per-order timeouts and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability and installation state, exposing an install function that triggers the browser's native install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder/stub file noting that backend canister operations are unused; exports nothing meaningful.
React Query hook that fetches 100 hourly klines from Binance Futures and runs a sentiment analysis utility, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrendPrediction.ts: React Query hook that fetches hourly and daily klines from Binance Futures and returns short-term and medium-term trend predictions, refreshing every 5 minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining a golden-themed design system with OKLCH CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes, plus utility classes for animations, glow effects, and PWA adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/services/binanceApi.ts: Service module wrapping Binance USD-M Futures public REST endpoints to fetch perpetual pairs, current prices, ticker prices, leverage brackets, and OHLCV klines.
frontend/src/services/binanceOrderServic: Service module for placing signed Binance Futures orders (market, take-profit, stop-loss) using HMAC-SHA256 via the Web Crypto API with a configurable request timeout.
frontend/src/services/binancePositionSer: Fetches open positions from Binance USD-M Futures API (/fapi/v2/positionRisk) using HMAC-SHA256 signing and maps them to the app's internal Position type with placeholder TP/SL values.
frontend/src/types/adjustment.ts: Defines TypeScript types for position adjustment suggestions (take-profit or stop-loss) and their acceptance/dismissal history.
frontend/src/types/aiTrade.ts: Defines types for AI-generated trades including trade status, modality, TP/SL levels, risk management steps, reversal detection state, and a price-enriched variant for UI consumption.
frontend/src/types/binanceApi.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Binance API responses including account info, position risk, orders, credentials, and related enums/types.
frontend/src/types/calculator.ts: Defines input and result types for the position size calculator, covering capital, risk percentage, entry/stop prices, leverage, and computed metrics.
frontend/src/types/exposure.ts: Defines types for portfolio exposure analysis including per-asset exposure, long/short balance, correlation risk, and warning flags.
frontend/src/types/position.ts: Defines core position types including TakeProfitLevel, StopLossRecommendation, Position, and a price-enriched PositionWithPrice variant with PnL and distance metrics.
frontend/src/types/prediction.ts: Defines types for trend predictions (direction, confidence, time horizon) and their historical records with optional actual outcomes.
frontend/src/types/reversal.ts: Defines types for market reversal detection signals and sub-indicators including RSI divergence, EMA crossover, candlestick patterns, volatility spikes, and support/resistance violations.
frontend/src/types/scenario.ts: Defines types for scenario simulation inputs, per-position outcomes (PnL, TP/SL/liquidation hit), aggregated scenario results, and preset scenarios.
frontend/src/types/sentiment.ts: Defines types for market sentiment analysis including bullish/bearish/neutral scores, contributing factors, and strength metrics.
frontend/src/types/tradeHistory.ts: Defines types for user and AI trade history records, trade outcomes, and performance metrics including per-modality win rate and PnL breakdowns.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentSuggestions: Generates TP/SL adjustment suggestions for open positions based on market conditions such as volatility, ATR, and proximity to support/resistance levels.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeHistoryStorage: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD utilities for persisting and retrieving AI trade history records, with duplicate prevention.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeSelection.ts: Computes technical indicators (RSI, ATR, EMA, momentum) from Binance kline data and uses per-modality configs to generate AI trade signals with TP/SL levels.
frontend/src/utils/binanceAuth.ts: Provides HMAC-SHA256 signing and an authenticated fetch wrapper for the Binance API, enforcing a 15-second timeout and throwing a typed `BinanceApiError` on timeout or failure.
Calculates portfolio exposure metrics (capital deployed, leverage, long/short balance, correlation risks, warning flags) from a list of positions with prices.
frontend/src/utils/liveTradingStorage.ts: Manages live trading mode, Binance API credentials, and per-modality live order toggles in localStorage, dispatching deferred custom DOM events on changes.
frontend/src/utils/marketReversalDetecto: Detects market trend reversals by analyzing Binance kline data using RSI divergence, EMA crossovers, candlestick patterns, ATR volatility spikes, and support/resistance violations across modality-specific timeframes.
frontend/src/utils/performanceCalculatio: Computes win rate, total PnL, and performance metrics for user and AI trade records, with per-modality breakdowns for AI trades.
frontend/src/utils/pnlCalculations.ts: Calculates leveraged PnL in USD and percentage for long/short positions, and computes the percentage distance between two price levels.
frontend/src/utils/positionSizeCalculato: Calculates position size, contract count, risk amount, and reward amount based on capital, risk percentage, stop-loss, entry price, and leverage inputs.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers a service worker, listens for updates with a user confirmation prompt to reload, and schedules hourly update checks.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioSimulator.ts: Defines preset market scenarios (crash, bull run, volatility) and a `simulateScenario` function that projects P&L, TP/SL hits, and liquidation risk for a list of positions given a percentage price change.
frontend/src/utils/sentimentAnalysis.ts: Implements technical indicator calculations (RSI, MACD, EMA, price action, volume trend, momentum) and an `analyzeSentiment` function that aggregates them into a structured `SentimentAnalysis` result with bullish/bearish factors.
frontend/src/utils/stopLossCalculator.ts: Calculates a recommended stop-loss price and associated loss metrics using ATR, support/resistance levels, and leverage-adjusted risk percentages, returning a `StopLossRecommendation` with reasoning and a partial-taking strategy.
Generates three take-profit levels (conservative, moderate, aggressive) for a position by combining volatility, leverage, and support/resistance data, returning profit amounts and reasoning for each level.
frontend/src/utils/technicalAnalysis.ts: Provides core technical analysis utilities: ATR calculation, volatility (standard deviation of returns), support/resistance detection via price clustering, and risk/reward ratio computation.
frontend/src/utils/totalCapitalStorage.t: Manages persistence of total trading capital in localStorage and dispatches a `total-capital-change` custom DOM event on writes to enable reactive updates across components.
frontend/src/utils/tradeHistoryStorage.t: Provides CRUD helpers for persisting user trade records (`UserTradeRecord[]`) in localStorage, including get, save (append), and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/trendPrediction.ts: Predicts short-term (1–24 hour) and medium-term (1–7 day) price trend direction and confidence using moving averages, momentum, and volatility derived from hourly and daily price arrays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, accordion keyframe animations, and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 53) describing a crypto trading monitoring app built with React/TypeScript/Tailwind, listing architectural notes, known bugs (frozen live trade mode, missing import button, unresponsive settings icon, etc.), and the full catalogue of existing and planned features.
